Subject: Beyond Buzzwords - Exploring Our Food Values
Description: Do organic strawberries taste better than conventional? How about local versus imported? And should you buy them anyway, even if they don't taste any better and are more expensive? In this session, we'll explore these questions in a fun, interactive, and delicious format.  We'll use comparative tastings, activities and discussion to explore the many factors - like local, free-range, and fair trade - that we're encouraged to think about when making eating and shopping decisions and some practical tools to use in the store.  Speakers include:Tammy Coxen
